about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description: I work in the construction industry, specializing in earthworks and demolitions, as well as capturing orthophotos using drones. Additionally, I freelance as a coder and responsive web designer, utilizing UI/UX design principles to deliver high-quality work.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: What I offer
services.description2: Design a landing page or website for your brand.
services.description3: Choose a domain that represents your brand.
services.description5: Creat dynamic interactions for your static or dynamic webpage or landing page.
services.description6: Earthwork and demolition services in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, Mexico.

testimonial.title: Testimonial
testimonial.subtitle: What customers say
testimonial.testimonial1: Excellent service! I loved the design of my website. The entire process, from the initial concept to the finished product, was a great experience. Sharing the site with my clients has been rewarding, and it helps parents feel more comfortable and confident in using it.
testimonial.testimonial2: I'm very grateful for my new website! It looks fantastic, and I can now showcase my portfolio to my clients, helping them feel more confident in the quality of my services.
